name: Verify that the user is able to perform flat monetary endorsement.

testSteps.description: 1: Verify that the user is able to perform flat monetary endorsement. ({AnnualExposure=1000000})

children.description: And underwriter performs endorsement with transaction effective date as policy effective date

And with Annual Exposure given as
| AnnualExposure |
| 1000000 |
And underwriter completes transaction and policy is endorsed successfully
Then the transaction premium should be the multiplication of transaction premium and prorate factor

And with Annual Exposure given as

| 20000000 |
And underwriter completes transaction and policy is endorsed successfully
Then the transaction premium should be the multiplication of transaction premium and prorate factor
